English.Text: Machinery expositions and lectures can be held here in order to greatly in increase the chance of specific visitors.
The Academy
Empty Exhibit
Logicstical Geniuses
Tradeships
Perfected Harvesting
Efficient Filamenting
Reduces the amount of coal required by a third.
Secure Mining
The shipyard construction exhibition in your academy attracts leading figures in the realm of ship construction to your city.
Increases the chance of shipyard related legendary visitors.
Shining Shipyards
Expositions centered around the construction and maintainance of ships will attract the most ingenious ship builders the world has seen.
Shining Shipyards
Showing modern farming technology is attracting leading agricultural experts.
Increases the chance of farming related legendary visitors.
Fantastic Farming
Showing modern farming technology will attract agricultural experts.
Fantastic Farming
The best traders from all over world flock to your city.
Increases the chance of trading related legendary visitors.
Tremendous Trading
Explaning the tricks of the trade will surely lure the greatest traders in the world to your city.
Tremendous Trading
Showing off your advanced military tactics draws in legendary military generals and pirate leaders alike.
Increases the chance of military related legendary visitors.
Military Machinations
Seeing your dominating military might will impress soldiers and pirates alike.
Military Machinations
The newest theological revelations attract even the highest of clerical figures.
Increases the chance of theology related legendary visitors.
Theological Truths
Finding new theological facts will attract even the most faithful clergy.
Theological Truths
The great atmosphere of artistry makes artist from far and wide travel to your city.
Erhöht die Wahrscheinlichkeit, dass legendäre Künstler diese Stadt besuchen.
Amazing Arts
Teachings of acting combined with a movement of freedom will bring every upcoming artist to your town.
Amazing Arts
Culinary masterpieces in your city attract other master chefs.
Increases the chance of food related legendary visitors.
Formidable Foods
Chefs from all disciplines work together to create wonderful new recipes and attract other experts in their field.
Formidable Foods
The outstanding medical education provided in your city attracts other accomplished doctors.
Increases the chance of medicine related legendary visitors.
Medical Marvels
Providing a faculty for medical education will attract other medical geniuses.
Medical Marvels
The show of amazing machinery and lectures by leading engineers attract other even more outstanding engineers.
Increases the chance of engineering related legendary visitors.
Epitomes of Engineering
Showing off your state-of-the-art machinery is sure to attract other engineers.
Epitomes of Engineering
Great fashion designers in your city attract their rivals.
Increases the chance of fashion related legendary visitors.
Fabulous Fashion
Having some fashion designers in your city will surely attract more.
Fabulous Fashion
The teachings of strict law enforcement in your city attracts other leading figures of the field.
Increases the chance of law related legendary visitors.
Rule of Law
Showing that your city is ruled with a strong fist will attract a certain kind of people.
Rule of Law
Unraveling the mysteries of ores and ingots attracts metalworkers from all over the world.
Increases the chance of metal related legendary visitors.
Metalworking Mysteries
Displaying your understanding of the world of metal will attract leading metalworkers.
Metalworking Mysteries
Showing how processes are optimized under your leadership pulls in other leading figures in this area.
Increases the chance of processing related legendary visitors.
Process Engineering
Lectures on process optimization will give rise to a strong increase of visitors working in this field.
Process Engineering
Incredible technologies for working on small objects attracts people with particularly skilled hands.
Increases the chance of intricacy related legendary visitors.
Intricate Ingenuities
A public show of the tools for intricate work available in your city is sure to attract leading experts in this field.
Intricate Ingenuities
The most accomplished logistical genuises work together to optimize your harbors.
Logicstical Geniuses
The top minds of agricultural science work together to perfect the harvesting process.
Perfected Harvesting
The use of further automation greatly reduces the probability of an accident in your mines.
Secure Mining
Put together, the experts in your city devise new strategies for filament production.
Efficient Filamenting
